name: Lukas Taegert
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I have been working professionally with react and angularJS for nearly two years and I am passionate about anything JS in my private projects as well. Lately, I have concerned myself with rollup and webpack and have made some forays into node server territory.
what_can_i_contribute: I could talk about my experience with webpack and rollup and how to make tree-shaking work :), also, testing is always a nice topic.
